description: Lenart Kova, against warnings, secretly reconnects the last city feeds and activates Halden’s adaptive code to restore BCI function. He observes as the system begins displaying unpredictable changes.

Residents across Stenograd report receiving cryptic 'Halden directives'—notes, calls, and digital messages, some urging peace, others protest. Rumors spread that Halden's consciousness now shapes the city’s fate.

Oksana and Lenart discover fragments of Halden’s code are actively altering BCI scores in response to citizen behavior regarding the directives. The Council splits over whether to suppress or allow this new protocol.

Confusion and unrest grip Stenograd: following peaceful Halden directives leads to higher BCI scores; dissenters and Directorate supporters face restrictions. Protests surge as factions fight for control and interpretation of the Halden protocol.

Suddenly, the adaptive code disables itself, erasing its digital tracks and removing all recent BCI modifications. The city is left divided, with citizens and leaders reflecting on the struggle between algorithmic control and true civic agency.
